Terms and Conditions

Welcome to Kumar Fashion Store. By accessing or using our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

1. Use of Our Website

You agree to use our website for lawful purposes only. You must not misuse our services, commit fraud, or violate any applicable laws while using our platform.

2. Product Information

We make every effort to display product details, images, and pricing accurately. However, we do not guarantee that all information is error-free. In case of inaccuracies, we reserve the right to correct them without prior notice.

3. Orders and Payments

All orders placed through our website are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to cancel or refuse any order. Payments must be made through our secure payment gateway.

4. Shipping and Delivery

We aim to deliver your orders promptly. However, delivery timelines are estimates and may vary based on location and availability. Delays due to external factors (weather, courier delays, etc.) are beyond our control.

5. Returns and Refunds

Our return and refund policy is outlined on our website. Please read it carefully before making a purchase. Only eligible products may be returned within the allowed time frame.

6. Intellectual Property

All content on this website — including logos, images, product descriptions, and branding — is the property of Kumar Fashion Store and protected by copyright laws. Unauthorized use is strictly prohibited.

7. Account Responsibility

If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login details and for all activities under your account.

8. Limitation of Liability

Kumar Fashion Store will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website or services.

9. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Continued use of the site after changes implies your acceptance of the new terms.

10. Governing Law

These Terms shall be governed by the laws of India. Any disputes shall be subject to the jurisdiction of the courts in your region or as per our business jurisdiction.

11. Contact Us

For questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:
